properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:15PM PST until February 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...MOUNTAIN SNOW THIS WEEKEND...

.A moist Pacific storm system will spread accumulating snow today
into Sunday across the higher terrain of southeast Washington and
portions of northern Idaho.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches over higher terrain, and 2 to 4 inches in the Silver
Valley.

* WHERE...Kellogg, Pinehurst, Osburn, Wallace, Mullan, Fourth of
July Pass, Dobson Pass, and Lookout Pass.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will likely be difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY
